Experience

Software Engineer

Epic

June 2014-Present

I work as a full-stack software engineer, and have responsibilities that cover the full lifetime of the software that I write; investigation, design, development, testing, and maintenance are all expected to be done for all of my code. I develop in an equal split between the front end, the back end, and the build. I'm very involved with my team's process and project management, and have come up with a development process that my team continues to use efficiently. My front end work has allowed me to work in ASP / .NET / C#, JavaScript, VB, HTML / CSS, and several related tools like Visual Studio, Balsamiq (for wireframes), SVN, Git, and more.
